CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 如此的；这样的；这等的；这种的；（指后文）那样的；类似的；下述一类的
（上文提到的）那样的情况；那件事；这种人

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 诸如此类的；上述一类的；同类的

word_group.brief_definition: 诸如…之类的, 例如, 那种的, 像…的, 那些人
(表示白得东西是不可能的)没有免费的午餐
word_group.phrase: there's no such thing as a free lunch

word_group.brief_definition: 虽然质量（或价值）不过如此
(所希望的事情没有发生而失望)没那么走运
虽然质量（或价值）不过如此
这种事情；这类事物；这样的事情
如此这般；如此如此；这样那样
此类标题生成案例；此类标题引起的案例
这样半知情的；这样一知半解的

bilingual.target: 乔伊认为这样的发展是好的。

bilingual.source: Exercise such as playing sports is fun.
bilingual.target: 例如运动这样的锻炼是有趣的。

bilingual.source: Words are not enough to relate such wonders.
bilingual.target: 言语不足以描述这样的奇迹。

bilingual.source: I have never seen such a view.
bilingual.target: 我从未见过这样的景色。

bilingual.source: Why would you say such a thing?
bilingual.target: 你为什么会说这样的话？

bilingual.source: This city does not need such scum.
bilingual.target: 这个城市不需要这样的败类。
他无法忍受这样的凌辱。

bilingual.source: I had never seen such a sight before.
bilingual.target: 以往我从未见过这样的景象。

bilingual.source: Mind you, he never said such a thing.
bilingual.target: 请注意，他并没有说过这样的话。

list.abstract: Such，英语词语，可作形容词、名词，翻译为这样的，如此的。
《such》是韩剧《奶酪陷阱》ost Part.3。《奶酪陷阱》主要讲述了甜美微笑背后隐藏着危险本性的完美男生刘正，与唯一看穿他真面目的女大学生洪雪之间发生的一系列浪漫温情的故事。

yingyinNormal.en: Sir, the diplomatic repercussions of such an action…
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生，这样的行为将造成外交影响……

yingyinNormal.en: My object in coming to Longbourn was to choose such a one from among Mr Bennet's daughters, for I am to inherit the estate and such an alliance will surely suit everyone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来浪博恩的目的就是从班纳特先生的女儿中挑选一个做太太，因为我将要继承令尊的财产，而像这样的结合一定会让每个人满意。

yingyinNormal.en: Do me! Do me! Do me! I have never felt such humor. So unbelievably not cool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 试试我！来！我也要！我从没感知过这样的喜感。一点都不好玩。

yingyinNormal.en: I never saw such a woman. She would certainly be a fearsome thing to behold.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我从没遇到过这样的女士，认识这样的女士一定是很可怕的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: This is ill-conceived. You should think before you bring a proposal such as this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这想法太糟了，你提出这样的提议之前该三思。

yingyinNormal.en: Well naturally, the school has been searched many times. No such chamber has been found.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然学校人员进行过好几次的搜寻，但是并没有找到这样的密室。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Such a testosterone boost may give a man the nudge to pursue a woman he might not have otherwise noticed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样的睪固酮激增就可能驱使男人去追求一位他原来也许不会注意到的女人。

yingyinNormal.en: Good afternoon. Now what would three young Gryffindors such of yourselves be doing inside on a day like this?
yingyinNormal.zh: 下午好，像你们三位这样的格兰芬多的年轻人，怎么甘愿呆在屋里呢？外面天气多好。

yingyinNormal.en: If we form such a partnership, our patients would have access to more modern equipment, to more advanced treatments.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们达成这样的合作关系，我们的病患就能用上更现代化的设备，能接受更先进的治疗。

yingyinNormal.en: Many years since I've had such an exemplary vegetable. To which my fair cousin should I compliment the excellence of the cooking?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我好多年都没有吃到这样的蔬菜了。这些佳肴是哪位表妹烹调的？

yingyinNormal.en: That doesn't seem likely. Her bed's of sturdy construction. Even the addition of a second normal size human being wouldn't cause a structural failure, much less a homunculus such as yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是不太可能的，她的床的构造很结实，就算多承重一个正常体型的人类也不会引致其床架松动的，更别提像你这样的小雏形人了。

yingyinNormal.en: Dr. Geller? I am such a huge fan.
yingyinNormal.zh: 盖勒博士？我真是仰慕你。

yingyinNormal.en: Am I such a burden? You're my son.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我竟是如此负担吗？你是我的儿子。

yingyinNormal.en: Great, oh you are such a sweetheart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太好了，你人真好。

yingyinNormal.en: Women with such feet became coveted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拥有那样双脚的女人让人垂涎。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry. I feel like such an idiot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对不起嘛，我感觉自己就像个白痴。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my master. Such a brilliant scheme.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，主人，您的计划实在高明。

yingyinNormal.en: I did. Comments and observations. Such as?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有， 一些意见和观察记录。比如说呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Such as? Let's not get ahead of ourselves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有什么结果？别得意忘形了。

yingyinNormal.en: How shall we punish him for such a speech?
yingyinNormal.zh: 亏他说得出，我们该怎么罚他呀？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 诸如...之类的；例如；那种的；像...的；那些人

examination_example.sentence: As fewer <highlight>such</highlight> workers enter the country, the characteristics of the agricultural workforce are changing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着进入该国的此类工人越来越少，农业劳动力的特征正在发生变化。

examination_example.sentence: First, most researchers would accept <highlight>such</highlight> a prize if they were offered one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，如果能得到这样的奖励，大多数研究人员都会接受。

examination_example.sentence: Despite these factors, many social scientists seem reluctant to tackle <highlight>such</highlight> problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管有这些因素，许多社会科学家似乎不愿意解决这样的问题。

examination_example.sentence: But even now, 54 percent of the jobs in the country are middle-skill jobs, <highlight>such</highlight> as construction and high-skill manufacturing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但即使是现在，该国54%的工作是中等技能的工作，如建筑和高技能制造业。

examination_example.sentence: But under anti-bribery laws, proof must be made of concrete benefits, <highlight>such</highlight> as approval of a contract or regulation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是根据反贿赂法的规定，必须找到具体的获利证据，比如批准某项合同或者法规。

examination_example.sentence: A typical work, <highlight>such</highlight> as Seven Days, consists of a single beautiful black-and-white photograph taken on an epic walk.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如《七天》这幅典型的作品，是由一张美丽的黑白照片组成，它拍摄于一次史诗般的徒步之旅。

sense_info_list.en: to so high a degree; so great (often used to emphasize a quality)

examination_example.sentence: He had <highlight>such</highlight> a pleasant, readable style that one might think that anyone could imitate it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的文风非常让人愉快、易读，这可能让人们认为任何人都可以模仿这种风格。

examination_example.sentence: Since technology has <highlight>such</highlight> an insatiable appetite for eating up human jobs, this phenomenon will continue to restructure our economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于技术对吞噬人类工作的欲望是无穷无尽的，所以该现象将会继续重塑我们的经济结构。

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps willfully, it may be easier to think about <highlight>such</highlight> lengthy timescales than about the more immediate future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 或许有意为之，思考如此长远的时间跨度比思考近期未来更为容易。

sense_info_list.en: of the type about to be mentioned

examination_example.sentence: An approach can close 63 percent of the achievement gap (measured by <highlight>such</highlight> factors as grades) between first-generation and other students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种方式可以把第一代大学生和其他学生之间的成绩差距缩小63%（以成绩等因素衡量）。

examination_example.sentence: Archaeologists also may locate buried remains by using <highlight>such</highlight> technologies as ground radar, magnetic-field recording, and metal detectors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考古学家还可以利用地面雷达、磁场记录和金属探测器等技术来定位被埋藏的遗迹。

word_usage.usage: such作限定词时，常放在不定冠词a/an之前，all, many, no, any, one, few, some等之后，但其前不可用many of, some of, all of等，如：such a problem; some such excuse

exam_freq_info.chinese: 此类的; 这样的; 如此程度的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: of a kind just specified or to be specified; to so high a degree
sense_info_list.zh: 此类的; 这样的; 如此程度的

examination_example.sentence: One of the first steps in dealing with emotions <highlight>such</highlight> as anger or fear is to acknowledge them as normal and human.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 处理愤怒或恐惧等情绪的第一步是承认它们是正常的、有人情味的。

examination_example.sentence: How do <highlight>such</highlight> behaviors serve us?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种行为如何为我们服务？

examination_example.sentence: Newly published research shows how erroneous <highlight>such</highlight> overviews are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最新发表的研究表明这种概述是多么错误。

word_usage.usage:
such修饰单数名词时，放于不定冠词a(an)之前，若名词前有one，no， any，some，all， many等修饰时，such放在这些修饰词之后。
示例：(1) He's such a man.
他就是这么一个人。
(2) There is no such thing.
没有这么一回事。

such位于句首时，句子须倒装，谓语动词的单复数根据其后的名词决定。
示例：(1) Such is my hope for the future.
我对未来的希望就是这样。
(2) Such were the facts.
事实就是这样。

such…that...表示“如此…以致...”，连接一个表示结果的状语从句，与so…that 意思相同，但用法不同，so后边可加形容词或副词，而such后要用名词。
示例：(1) He runs so fast that nobody can catch up with him.
他跑得非常快，没人能追上他。 
(2) He is such a good man that we all  like him. 
他是个好人，我们都很喜欢他。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Prior to the new study, little was known about the risks of getting directly infected by common respiratory viruses, <highlight>such</highlight> as the flu or common cold, on an airplane, the researchers said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员说，在这项新研究之前，人们对在飞机上直接感染诸如流感或普通感冒等常见呼吸道病毒的风险知之甚少。

examination_example.sentence: All the surveys found that people mixed up names within relationship groups <highlight>such</highlight> as grandchildren, friends and siblings but hardly ever crossed these boundaries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有的调查都发现，人们在诸如祖孙、朋友和兄弟姐妹等关系群体中混淆了名字，但几乎从未跨越过这些界限。

examination_example.sentence: The remaining 22% lived in the home of another family member (<highlight>such</highlight> as a grandparent, in-law or sibling (兄弟姐妹) , a non-relative, or in group quarters like college dormitories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 剩下的22%则住在其他的家人(如祖父母、姻亲或兄弟姐妹)或非亲属家中，或者住在集体宿舍(如大学宿舍)。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Such</highlight> cats displayed more aggressive and anxious behavioural styles as well as more stress-related sickness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样的猫表现出更强的攻击性和焦虑的行为方式，以及更多与压力有关的疾病。

examination_example.sentence: That <highlight>such</highlight> mobility has become more difficult in San Jose raises questions about: the endurance of that foundational belief.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在圣何塞，这种流动性变得更加困难，这引发了一个问题：这种基本信念的持久性。

examination_example.sentence: In spite of <highlight>such</highlight> temporary measures, soaring food prices and spreading hunger in many other countries are beginning to break down the social order.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管采取了这些临时措施，但食品价格飙升和饥饿在许多其他国家蔓延，正开始破坏社会秩序。

sense_info_list.en: to so high a degree; so great (often used to emphasize a quality)

examination_example.sentence: And in <highlight>such</highlight> great numbers, their commercial hunting of ducks and geese became an industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数量如此之多，他们对鸭子和鹅的商业捕猎成为了一项产业。

examination_example.sentence: While cheek-kissing for Latin Americans is also a universal greeting form, it does not require <highlight>such</highlight> a high degree of relational closeness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然对拉丁美洲人来说，亲脸颊也是一种普遍的问候形式，但它并不需要如此程度的关系亲密。

examination_example.sentence: They're documenting why teaching is <highlight>such</highlight> a fruitful way to learn, and designing innovative ways for young people to engage in instruction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们正在研究为什么通过教学来学习会如此富有成效，并开创新方法让年轻人参与到这一过程当中。

sense_info_list.en: of the type about to be mentioned

examination_example.sentence: Some of those small mammals help to sustain <highlight>such</highlight> big birds as golden eagles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一些小型哺乳动物帮助供养金雕这样的大鸟。

examination_example.sentence: It would seem silly to call <highlight>such</highlight> a thing a "disease. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将那样的事情称为“疾病”似乎很愚蠢。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Such</highlight> personality characteristics as self-discipline have no effect on longevity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像自律那样的人格特征对长寿并没有影响。

examination_example.sentence: As <highlight>such</highlight>, different populations of killer whales have had to learn different hunting techniques in order to gain the upper hand over their local prey (猎物) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，不同种群的虎鲸必须学习不同的捕猎技术，才能在捕捉当地猎物中占上风。

word_usage.usage:
such…that...表示“如此…以致...”，连接一个表示结果的状语从句，与so…that 意思相同，但用法不同，so后边可加形容词或副词，而such后要用名词。
示例：(1) He runs so fast that nobody can catch up with him.
他跑得非常快，没人能追上他。 
(2) He is such a good man that we all  like him. 
他是个好人，我们都很喜欢他。

such位于句首时，句子须倒装，谓语动词的单复数根据其后的名词决定。
示例：(1) Such is my hope for the future.
我对未来的希望就是这样。
(2) Such were the facts.
事实就是这样。

such修饰单数名词时，放于不定冠词a(an)之前，若名词前有one，no， any，some，all， many等修饰时，such放在这些修饰词之后。
示例：(1) He's such a man.
他就是这么一个人。
(2) There is no such thing.
没有这么一回事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 诸如…之类的；例如；那种的；像…的；那些人

examination_example.sentence: Participating in <highlight>such</highlight> events is a great way to learn about school facilities and understand campus culture: What do students do for fun?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参加这样的活动是了解学校设施和了解校园文化的好方法：学生们都做些什么来娱乐？

examination_example.sentence: When you come across <highlight>such</highlight> words, check a dictionary to confirm their exact pronunciations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你遇到这样的单词时，查字典确认它们的准确发音。

examination_example.sentence: The biggest motivation for <highlight>such</highlight> platforms is to popularize Al.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这类平台最大的动机就是普及Al。

examination_example.sentence: I've taken so many Udemy courses, and ifs <highlight>such</highlight> a great feeling to get my brain working again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我参加了Udemy上的很多课程，让大脑重新运转的感觉真好。

examination_example.sentence: He is <highlight>such</highlight> a help to his mother.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他是他母亲的得力助手。

examination_example.sentence: Building <highlight>such</highlight> a bridge over the bay was *a hard nut to crack* but the local government made it within two years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在海湾上建造这样一座桥是一件难事，但当地政府在两年内就完成了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 如此的; 类似的(人/物/事)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 诸如…之类的；例如；那种的；像…的；那些人

sense_info_list.en: of a kind just specified or to be specified
sense_info_list.zh: 如此的; 类似的(人/物/事)

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>such</highlight> a poor excuse for people who fear change.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于害怕改变的人来说，这是一个糟糕的借口。

examination_example.sentence: There are also organizations like this in other countries, <highlight>such</highlight> as Indonesia and Spain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他国家也有这样的组织，比如印度尼西亚和西班牙。

examination_example.sentence: Though <highlight>such</highlight> tools have not become popular yet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这样的工具还没有普及。

word_usage.usage:
such修饰单数名词时，放于不定冠词a(an)之前，若名词前有one，no， any，some，all， many等修饰时，such放在这些修饰词之后。
示例：(1) He's such a man.
他就是这么一个人。
(2) There is no such thing.
没有这么一回事。

such位于句首时，句子须倒装，谓语动词的单复数根据其后的名词决定。
示例：(1) Such is my hope for the future.
我对未来的希望就是这样。
(2) Such were the facts.
事实就是这样。

such…that...表示“如此…以致...”，连接一个表示结果的状语从句，与so…that 意思相同，但用法不同，so后边可加形容词或副词，而such后要用名词。
示例：(1) He runs so fast that nobody can catch up with him.
他跑得非常快，没人能追上他。 
(2) He is such a good man that we all like him. 
他是个好人，我们都很喜欢他。
